name: DotnetGlobalToolInstaller
description: Installs a .NET Core Global. Uses dotnet cli internally.
author: Arne Petersen

inputs.name: versionSpec
inputs.label: Tool version
inputs.helpMarkDown: A version or version range that specifies the version to make available on the agent. Use x as a wildcard.

inputs.name: checkLatest
inputs.label: Always download the latest matching version
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Always check for and download the latest available version which satisfies the version spec. This option will also always incur download time, even if the selected version is already cached.

Enabling this option could cause unexpected build breaks when a new version of the tool is released.

inputs.name: includePrerelease
inputs.label: Include pre-release versions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include pre-release versions when searching for available versions.
